price: Enti (Yεrebͻ) abͻdeε a edi kan no Yεbrεε ho anaa? Nanso wͻn adwen nnsi pi wͻ abͻdeε foforͻ (anaasε Owusͻreε) no ho.
arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afaʿayīnā bil-khalqi al-awali bal hum fī labsin min khalqin jadīdin
